item.title: 人工智能加速发展，Alphabet估值飙升至4万亿美元
item.description: 随着谷歌母公司乘着人工智能的东风，Alphabet 的估值在周一逼近 4 万亿美元，将成为第四家进入这一专属俱乐部的公司。【原文：Alphabet closed in on a $4 trillion valuation on Monday, set to become only the fourth company to enter the exclusive club, as the Google parent rides an artificial intelligence-driven rally.】

item.title: 诺斯罗普预计乌克兰停火后欧洲仍将增长
item.description: 美国诺斯罗普-格鲁曼防务公司国际业务主管表示，即使俄罗斯停止在乌克兰的战争，该公司预计欧洲市场仍将继续增长，因为各国都希望补充冲突期间消耗的武器库存。【原文：U.S. defence company Northrop Grumman expects continued growth in Europe even if the Russian war in Ukraine is halted, as nations aim to replenish weapons stockpiles depleted during the conflict, the company's chief of international business said.】

item.title: 威廉姆斯-索诺玛公司起诉 Quince 公司销售 "假冒 "产品
item.description: 威廉姆斯-索诺玛（Williams-Sonoma）起诉昆斯（Quince）公司，后者有时被称为 "骗子 "公司，指控其误导消费者，销售外观相似但质量低劣的产品，而且售价更低。【原文：Williams-Sonoma sued Quince , a retailer sometimes known as a "dupe" company, accusing it of misleading consumers by selling similar-looking but inferior products and selling them for less.】

item.title: 美国银行利润大增 13.5%：美国联邦存款保险公司
item.description: 据美国联邦存款保险公司周一报告，2025 年第三季度美国银行业利润猛增 13.5%，达到 793 亿美元。【原文：The U.S. banking industry saw its profits jump 13.5% to $79.3 billion in the third quarter of 2025, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation reported Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普批评取消地方电视台所有权上限后，Tegna 下跌 5
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统批评了取消地方电视台所有权现行上限的提议后，Tegna 的股价周一下跌了近 5%，而这是该公司被 Nexstar Media 收购的必要条件。【原文：Shares in Tegna fell nearly 5% on Monday after President Donald Trump criticized a proposal to lift the current cap on local television station ownership, which is necessary for the company to be acquired by Nexstar Media.】

item.title: 拉加德警告说，欧盟在人工智能方面的失误将危及其未来
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周一表示，欧洲在人工智能领域的失误正在危及自身的未来，必须尽快消除阻碍这一新技术推广的障碍。【原文：Europe is jeopardising its own future by missing the boat on artificial intelligence and must quickly remove obstacles that prevent the diffusion of this new technology, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特朗普正在权衡推进对华销售英伟达芯片事宜
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周一在接受彭博新闻社采访时表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在权衡是否允许英伟达（Nvidia）向中国出售先进的人工智能芯片。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is weighing whether to allow Nvidia to sell advanced artificial intelligence chips to China, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said in an interview to Bloomberg News on Monday.】

item.title: 零售商 Kohl's 任命临时首席执行官 Michael Bender 为长期职位
item.description: 科尔百货公司（Kohl's）周一任命零售业资深人士迈克尔-本德（Michael Bender）为其永久首席执行官，在经历了多年销售额下滑、利润缩水、高层人事变动之后，由一位内部人士来指导其扭亏为盈。【原文：Kohl's on Monday named retail veteran Michael Bender as its permanent CEO, tapping an insider to steer its turnaround after years of sliding sales and shrinking profit amid churn at the top.】

item.title: 医疗保险公司因特朗普考虑延长《美国医疗保险法案》补贴的报道而上涨
item.description: 据媒体报道，白宫准备公布一项政策框架，将《平价医疗法案》（Affordable Care Act）的保费补贴（又称奥巴马医改）延长两年，并增加新的资格限制，随后美国医疗保险公司的股价周一跳涨。【原文：Shares of U.S. health insurers jumped on Monday following a media report the White House was preparing to unveil a policy framework that would extend Affordable Care Act premium subsidies - also known as Obamacare - for two years and add new eligibility limits.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，随着禁令放松，沙特阿拉伯将开设更多酒类商店
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯计划开设两家新的酒类专卖店，其中一家为国家石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）的非穆斯林外籍员工提供服务。【原文：Saudi Arabia plans to open two new alcohol stores, including one serving non-Muslim, foreign staff at state oil giant Aramco , as the kingdom further eases restrictions, according to people briefed on the plans.】

item.title: 万事达卡与欧莱雅在拉丁美洲推出美容院联名商务卡
item.description: 万事达卡和欧莱雅周一在一份联合声明中表示，它们将为拉丁美洲和加勒比地区的美容美发店经营者推出一款联合商务卡。【原文：Mastercard and L'Oreal are launching a joint business card for beauty salon operators in Latin America and the Caribbean, they said in a joint statement on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲首次在乌克兰推出星链（Starlink）直达蜂窝服务
item.description: 乌克兰最大的移动运营商 Kyivstar 周一表示，该公司已成为欧洲首家发射 Starlink 直对蜂窝卫星技术的公司，以求在战时停电和基础设施中断的情况下保持数百万人的连接。【原文：Ukraine's largest mobile operator Kyivstar has become the first in Europe to launch Starlink's direct-to-cell satellite technology in a bid to keep millions connected amid wartime blackouts and disrupted infrastructure, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 因融资问题，Grindr 董事会终止 34.6 亿美元私有化收购谈判
item.description: 约会应用 Grindr 周一表示，公司已经结束了与大股东关于以 34.6 亿美元将公司私有化的非约束性提案的谈判，理由是融资存在不确定性。【原文：Dating app Grindr said on Monday it has ended talks on a non-binding proposal from major shareholders to take the company private for $3.46 billion, citing uncertainty over financing.】

item.title: 只卖冰淇淋随着联合利华分拆上市的临近，玛格南为独立生活做好准备
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）供应链负责人表示，联合利华的冰淇淋业务正在为下个月价值数十亿美元的分拆做准备，随时准备应对单飞后从物流到减肥药日益流行等各种挑战。【原文：Unilever's ice cream business is gearing up for its multi-billion-dollar spin-off next month, ready to tackle challenges from logistics to the rising popularity of weight loss drugs when it goes solo, its supply chain head said.】

item.title: 福克斯商业》报道：美联储主席沃勒称 10 天前曾就美联储主席职位与财政部长会面
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，他最近与财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）进行了会晤，进一步讨论了他可能被提名为美联储主席的问题，因为特朗普政府正在着手挑选杰罗姆-鲍威尔的继任者。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he met with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent recently to further discuss his possible nomination as Fed Chair, as the Trump administration moves forward in picking a replacement for Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 德意志银行认为标准普尔 500 指数到 2026 年底将升至 8,000 点
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）周一预计，到明年年底，S&P 500 指数将攀升至 8000 点，理由是强劲的企业盈利和人工智能驱动的收益，使其成为全球主要券商中最看涨的一家。【原文：Deutsche Bank on Monday projected the S&P 500 index to climb to 8,000 by the end of next year, citing strong corporate earnings and artificial intelligence-driven gains, making it the most bullish among major global brokerages.】

item.title: Trafigura 前顶级镍交易员否认合谋诈骗 6 亿美元
item.description: 特拉菲古拉公司（Trafigura）前首席镍交易员周一在伦敦的一次庭审中否认了印度商人普拉蒂克-古普塔（Prateek Gupta）的指控，即他帮助策划了一起价值 6 亿美元的欺诈案，将昂贵的金属换成廉价或无价值的金属。【原文：Trafigura's former head nickel trader denied allegations by Indian businessman Prateek Gupta on Monday in a London trial that he helped devise a $600 million fraud to swap expensive metals for cheap or worthless ones.】

item.title: 美国农业部部长称，几周内将达成农民援助和中国大豆采购协议
item.description: 美国农业部长布鲁克-罗林斯（Brooke Rollins）周一表示，特朗普政府预计将在未来两周内就美国农民援助和中国大豆采购达成协议，但没有透露其他细节。【原文：U.S. Agriculture Secretary Brooke Rollins on Monday said the Trump administration expected to have deals regarding aid for U.S. farmers and Chinese soybean purchases within the next two weeks, but gave no other details.】

item.title: 绩效食品集团与美国食品公司结束合并谈判
item.description: Performance Food Group 公司和 US Foods 公司周一表示，将不再寻求潜在的合并。【原文：Performance Food Group Company and US Foods will no longer pursue a potential merger, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 金融服务公司 SWB 将以 81 亿美元的 SPAC 交易在纽交所上市
item.description: 特殊目的收购公司 SWB 周一表示，将通过与 Soulpower Acquisition Corp 合并，以 81 亿美元的交易价格在美国上市。【原文：Financial services firm SWB will go public in the U.S. through a merger with Soulpower Acquisition Corp in a $8.1 billion deal, the special purpose acquisition company said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，税务和海关警察突袭了亚马逊在意大利的两个站点，调查中国走私案
item.description: 三位直接了解此事的消息人士称，意大利警方周一对亚马逊在意大利的两个站点进行了搜查和扣押，这是对涉嫌走私中国商品的调查的一部分。【原文：Italian police carried out searches and seizures at two Amazon sites in Italy on Monday as part of an investigation into the alleged smuggling of Chinese goods, three sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 早间竞价美联储会出手相救吗？
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 独家报道美国参议员呼吁调查 Facebook 和 Instagram 上的诈骗广告
item.description: 美国参议员乔希-霍利（Josh Hawley）和理查德-布卢门撒尔（Richard Blumenthal）要求联邦贸易委员会和证券交易委员会的负责人对 Meta Platforms 进行调查，此前路透社曾报道过这家社交媒体巨头从 Facebook 和 Instagram 上的广告中获得收入，而这些广告都是宣传诈骗和违禁商品的。【原文：U.S. senators Josh Hawley and Richard Blumenthal have asked the heads of the Federal Trade Commission and the Securities and Exchange Commission to probe Meta Platforms, following a Reuters report about the social media giant's revenue from ads on Facebook and Instagram that promote scams and banned goods.】

item.title: 诺和诺德称阿尔茨海默氏症药物试验失败，股价受挫
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）周一表示，在测试该药是否能减缓阿尔茨海默病患者认知能力下降的后期试验中，一种较老的塞马鲁肽（semaglutide）口服版本未能达到主要目标，导致其股价下跌了10%。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Monday an older oral version of its semaglutide drug failed to meet its main goal in late-stage trials testing whether the medicine can slow cognitive decline in Alzheimer's patients, sending its share price down 10%.】

item.title: 投资者考虑美联储降息，关注数据，华尔街期货涨跌不一
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货在波澜不惊的交易中涨跌不一，因为投资者在权衡美联储即将降息的可能性，并搜寻数据以更清晰地了解央行的货币政策轨迹。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were mixed in choppy trading on Monday, as investors weighed the likelihood of an imminent interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve and scoured for data to get more clarity on the central bank's monetary policy trajectory.】

item.title: 经济学家认为 2026 年美国经济增长将略有加快，通胀将呈胶着状态
item.description: 接受全美商业经济协会调查的经济学家在该协会的年终预测调查中表示，明年美国经济增长将略有提高，但就业增长仍将疲软，美联储进一步降息的步伐也将放缓。【原文：U.S. economic growth will increase slightly next year but employment gains will remain sluggish and the Federal Reserve will slow any further rate cuts, economists polled by the National Association for Business Economics said in the group's year-end forecast survey.】

item.title: DoubleLine警惕人工智能融资潮可能改变美国高等级债务市场
item.description: 大型科技公司纷纷出售债券，为人工智能的扩张提供资金，这为 9 万亿美元的美国企业债券市场带来了一场高风险的赌注，促使 DoubleLine 等知名投资者对该行业不断增长的债务负担持谨慎态度。【原文：A rush of bond sales by major tech firms to fund artificial intelligence expansion is creating a high-stakes bet for the $9 trillion U.S. corporate bond market, prompting caution from prominent investors like DoubleLine over the sector's growing debt load.】

item.title: 关税迷雾散去，企业淡化涨价言论
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的公司声明和财报电话会议，第三季度表示要涨价的全球公司较少，这表明随着美国贸易协议促进了更清晰的财务规划，以及公司寻求限制失去销售额的风险，公司的策略发生了变化。【原文：Fewer global companies signaled price hikes in the third quarter, pointing to a change in tack as U.S. trade deals facilitate clearer financial planning and firms seek to limit risks of losing sales, according to company statements and earnings calls reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 "黑色星期五 "人潮创纪录，高价之下特价商品减少
item.description: 预计将有空前数量的美国人在这个黑色星期五逛商店，但他们很可能会减少消费，因为他们发现受关税影响的零售商的特价商品较少。【原文：Unprecedented numbers of Americans are expected to hit stores this Black Friday, but they are likely to curtail their spending as they find fewer bargains from tariff-hit retailers.】

item.title: 欧盟无条件批准宏盟收购 IPG
item.description: 欧盟委员会周一表示，已无条件批准宏盟集团（Omnicom Group）以 132.5 亿美元全股票收购竞争对手英特公共集团（Interpublic Group .【原文：The EU Commission on Monday said it had unconditionally approved Omnicom Group's $13.25 billion all-stock deal to buy rival Interpublic Group .】
